definition: Qinghai-Tibetan plateau
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
storehouse/depository/Buddhist or Taoist scripture
Tibet/Xizang 西藏
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
Hara (Japanese surname)
former/original/primary/raw/level/cause/source

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: Feng Yongfeng reports from the village of Cuochi on the Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 冯永锋来自青藏高原措池村的报道。

sentences.english: The plateau is the world's third largest store of ice.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原是世界第三大的冰储藏地。

sentences.english: Sichuan is bordered by the Tibetan Plateau in the west and by the Three Gorges and the Yangtze River in the east.
sentences.chinese: 四川西临青藏高原而东接三峡和长江。

sentences.english: The muscid biogeography of Qinghai-Xizang Plateau is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对青藏高原蝇科昆虫进行了生物地理学研究。

sentences.english: The result suggests that the Himalayas and the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau will not continue to move up indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 测量结果表明，喜马拉雅山和青藏高原不会无限升高。

sentences.english: Kangding County is located in the transition area between the west hilly edge of Sichuan Basin and the Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 康定县地处四川盆地西缘山地及青藏高原过渡地带。

sentences.english: A lot of observational data on the atmospheric boundary layer over the plateau were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 获得了大量的关于青藏高原大气边界层的宝贵资料。

sentences.english: The crust and lithosphere of the Tibet is very thick, and the LVZ is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原地壳岩石圈巨厚，上地幔低速带不明显。

sentences.english: By the 13th century, Islam spread as far as to Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 13世纪，伊斯兰已推进到青藏高原的四缘。

sentences.english: The authority also forecast light to moderate snow or sleet in the eastern Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 有关部门预报青藏高原东部地区将有小到中雪或冻雨。

sentences.english: The Tibetan plateau has in the past been the scene of ethnic conflict.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原和过去一样出现了种族冲突的场景。

sentences.english: Conclusions The tested strain has a strong virulence and belongs to Qinghai-Tibet plateau in biotype.
sentences.chinese: 结论该菌株毒力较强，其生化型为青藏高原生物型。

sentences.english: Qinghai-Tibet Plateau dry and cold climatic change has the characteristics that advance from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原的干冷气候变化具有由东向西推进的特点。

sentences.english: The origin of Changjiang River is Qingzang High Land . …
sentences.chinese: 长江发源于青藏高原用英文怎么说？

sentences.english: Zabuye saline lake, situated in the hinterland of Tibet plateau, is a contemparysaline lake deposit.
sentences.chinese: 扎布耶盐湖位于青藏高原腹地，是一个现代盐湖矿床。

definition: the roof of the world/usually refers to Tibet or Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]
plateau/CL:片[pian4]
Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Himalayas
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Mt Gangdisê (6656m) in southwest Tibet, revered by Tibetans as the center of the universe
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Yarlung Tsangpo River, Tibet
Gangdisê mountain range in southwest Tibet
Loess Plateau of northwest China
former Kham province of Tibet, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
